name: Assault and Batteries
description:
Created for the Media Molecule 'Power' game jam! Assault and Batteries is an endless fight against hoards of robots, where your battery level is linked to your survival!

run from the robots with wsad and shoot at them by clicking the mouse!

  Pick up batteries to increase your speed, health and fire rate.

how long can you last against an endless onslaught of robots?

programming by Peter Ratledge and Chris Kemp

Design by Lawrence shahid

 sound by Gregory Scott Lester

Music by Lewis Thomson
